item.title: 塞内加尔计划利用地区债务市场弥补预算缺口
item.description: 塞内加尔将依靠西非地区债务市场来弥补其 2026 年的预算缺口，此前塞内加尔发现了数十亿美元的未报告借款，这使其实际上被国际市场拒之门外。【原文：Senegal will rely on West Africa’s regional debt market to close its 2026 budget gap after uncovering billions of dollars in unreported borrowings, leaving it effectively shut out of international markets.】

item.title: 富裕世界的降息势头正在消退
item.description: 2025 年全球货币政策的最后一轮决策可能会展示发达经济体的宽松周期是如何缺乏新的动力或实际上已经结束的。【原文：The final flurry of global monetary policy decisions for 2025 is likely to showcase how the easing cycle in advanced economies either lacks fresh impetus or is effectively over.】

item.title: 公司债券投资者狂欢，宿醉即将来临：信贷周刊
item.description: 尽管风险并不存在，但公司债券市场上的恐惧情绪又在逐渐消退。【原文：Fear is drifting out of the corporate-bond market again, even if the risks aren’t.】

item.title: 以军事为主导的西非国家启动地区投资银行
item.description: 由军方领导的马里、布基纳法索和尼日尔政府已经启动了一个地区投资银行，初始资本为 5000 亿非洲法郎（约合 8.95 亿美元），用于资助基础设施、能源和农业项目。【原文：The military-led governments of Mali, Burkina Faso and Niger have launched a regional investment bank with an initial capital of 500 billion CFA francs ($895 million) to fund infrastructure, energy and agricultural projects.】

item.title: 可口可乐正在与 TDR 谈判，以挽救 Costa Coffee 的出售：金融时报
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引知情人士的话报道，可口可乐公司本周末将与 TDR Capital 举行最后的谈判，因为其出售 Costa Coffee 的提议面临破裂的风险。【原文：Coca-Cola Co. is holding last-ditch talks with TDR Capital this weekend as its proposed sale of Costa Coffee faces the risk of collapse, the Financial Times reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 万科延期计划未获债券持有人足够支持
item.description: 中国万科集团（China Vanke Co.）未能获得足够的债券持有人支持其延长12月15日到期的地方债券期限的提议，从而加剧了这家曾是全美销售额最大的住宅建筑商的违约风险。【原文：China Vanke Co. failed to obtain sufficient bondholder support for its proposed extension on a local bond due Dec. 15, heightening default risk for what was once the nation’s largest homebuilder by sales.】

item.title: Tether 的 11 亿美元尤文图斯游戏让新资金与旧资金对决
item.description: Tether Holdings SA 收购尤文图斯足球俱乐部（Juventus Football Club SpA）的要约，让一家快速发展的加密货币巨头与一个拥有逾百年历史的意大利工业王朝对决。【原文：Tether Holdings SA’s offer to acquire Juventus Football Club SpA pits a fast-growing crypto powerhouse against a more than century-old Italian industrial dynasty.】

item.title: 中粮国际将首批阿根廷小麦运往中国
item.description: 中国国有农业巨头中粮国际有限公司（Cofco International Ltd.）的贸易部门周六在一份声明中说，中粮国际有限公司正在装载第一批运往中国的阿根廷小麦散货，从而开启了两国之间新的贸易往来。【原文：Cofco International Ltd. is loading the first bulk commercial shipment of Argentine wheat to China, kicking off a new trade flow between the two countries, the Chinese state-owned agricultural giant’s trading unit said in a statement on Saturday.】

item.title: 2026 年，华尔街跳过科技，走 "老派 "增长之路
item.description: 随着新年的临近，一个主题正变得越来越普遍：在牛市中叱咤风云的科技巨头们将不再是主角。【原文：One theme is becoming prevalent as the new year approaches: The technology giants that have been shouldering this bull market will no longer be running the show.】

item.title: 开源代码和核能是人工智能的基石
item.description: David Westin 探讨了为什么开放源代码和核能对人工智能如此重要。【原文：David Westin examines why open-open source code and nuclear energy are so important for AI.】

item.title: 马来西亚将获得与 1MDB 律师有关的毕加索和马蒂斯艺术品
item.description: 马来西亚表示，在与美国官员讨论遣返与 1MDB 全球腐败丑闻有关的资产后，马来西亚将获得 12 件艺术品，其中包括巴勃罗-毕加索（Pablo Picasso）、琼-米罗（Joan Miro）和亨利-马蒂斯（Henri Matisse）的作品。【原文：Malaysia said it will get 12 artworks including those by Pablo Picasso, Joan Miro and Henri Matisse after discussions with US officials to repatriate assets tied to the global corruption scandal at 1MDB.】

item.title: 特朗普的人工智能赌注因失业和通胀担忧而蒙上阴影
item.description: 选民对其承诺越来越怀疑，对其危险越来越担忧。【原文：Voters are becoming increasingly skeptical about its promise and more worried by its perils.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：分崩离析的美联储降低美国利率
item.description: 美联储本周再次下调了基准利率，但会议细节凸显了决策者之间的分歧，这将在明年迎接新一任美联储主席的到来。【原文：The Federal Reserve lowered its benchmark interest rate again this week, though details from the meeting highlighted fractures among policymakers that will greet a new Fed chair next year.】

item.title: 金融时报》：阿波罗押注易受人工智能影响的软件制造商
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）对几家软件制造商的贷款下了赌注，因为该公司越来越看跌易受人工智能影响的科技公司。【原文：Apollo Global Management placed bets against the loans of several software makers as it grew increasingly bearish on technology firms vulnerable to artificial intelligence, the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: 科技热潮推动能源需求，绿色股票成为大赢家
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统推行其 "大石油 "议程的背景下，今年本应是绿色股票黯淡无光的一年。然而，随着人工智能推动了对各种能源的大量需求，该行业正在蓬勃发展。【原文：It was supposed to be a glum year for green stocks as President Donald Trump pushed his Big Oil agenda. Instead, the sector is booming as artificial intelligence powers massive demand for all kinds of energy.】

item.title: 中国将于 2026 年发行超长期特别国债
item.description: 中国财政部计划明年发行超长期特别国债，所得资金将用于支持重大国家战略和安全举措。【原文：China’s finance ministry plans to issue ultra-long-term special government bonds next year, with proceeds used to support major national strategies and security initiatives.】

item.title: 贸易谈判迟迟未决，美国寻求拓宽与越南的防务关系
item.description: 在双方继续敲定贸易协议细节之际，华盛顿驻越南最高特使表示，美国寻求扩大和深化与越南的防务关系。【原文：The US seeks to expand and deepen its defense relationship with Vietnam, according to Washington’s top envoy to the nation, as the two sides continue to hammer out details of a trade deal.】

item.title: 警告称英国人不敢消费，圣诞阴霾加剧
item.description: 一位前英格兰银行利率制定者警告说，英国家庭正在囤积现金而不是花钱，因为过去五年的冲击让他们感到经济上没有安全感，这使得圣诞节前的阴霾气氛更加浓厚。【原文：UK households are hoarding cash rather than spending it because the shocks of the past five years have left them feeling financially insecure, a former Bank of England rate-setter warned, adding to a growing sense of gloom in the run-up to Christmas.】

item.title: 奥地利正在向欧洲展示如何在基础设施建设上高瞻远瞩
item.description: 在欧洲大部分地区，建设基础设施是一项挑战。有限的预算和两极分化的政治倾向于破坏长期项目，迫使官员对紧急情况做出反应，而不是为未来做规划。【原文：It’s challenging to build infrastructure in much of Europe. Constrained budgets and polarized politics tend to undermine long-term projects, forcing officials to react to emergencies rather than plan for the future.】

item.title: 债务、通胀和政治如何推高借贷成本
item.description: 长期债券收益率长期居高不下，导致全球借贷成本上升。这是因为，面对根深蒂固的预算赤字、持续的通货膨胀以及围绕央行独立性不断出现的问题，投资者要求为持有政府债务获得额外补偿。【原文：A prolonged period of elevated long-term bond yields is ramping up borrowing costs around the world. That’s because investors are demanding extra compensation for holding government debt in the face of entrenched budget deficits, sticky inflation and burgeoning questions around central bank independence.】

item.title: 特朗普声称停火后柬埔寨与泰国冲突仍在继续
item.description: 泰国表示将继续对柬埔寨采取军事行动，以消除 "伤害和威胁"，甚至在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普声称已促成新的停火协议后，泰国仍加强了言辞。【原文：Thailand said it will continue military actions against Cambodia to eliminate “harm and threats,” stepping up rhetoric even after US President Donald Trump claimed to have brokered a new ceasefire.】

item.title: TPG 为 "眉毛女王 "化妆品下注 6 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，作为债务重组的一部分，TPG 公司退出了其在 Anastasia Beverly Hills 公司的大部分股份，私募股权公司在这家化妆品公司的 6 亿美元投资基本化为乌有。【原文：TPG Inc. exited most of its stake in Anastasia Beverly Hills as part of a debt restructuring, largely wiping out the private equity firm’s $600 million investment in the cosmetics company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 希捷和 Alnylam 等六家公司将加入纳斯达克 100 指数
item.description: 纳斯达克 100 指数的监管机构周五表示，作为其年度重组的一部分，将有六家公司加入该指数。【原文：Six firms are set to join the Nasdaq 100 Index as part of its annual reconstitution, the benchmark’s overseer said Friday.】

item.title: 中国对人工智能的狂热掩盖了更加黯淡的技术现实
item.description: 本月，摩尔芯线科技有限公司（Moore Threads Technology Co.这种兴奋可能是错位的。【原文：Moore Threads Technology Co.’s phenomenal debut this month — China’s most successful coming-out party since 2019 — capped a year in which investors have grown increasingly excited about the prospects for the country’s AI chip advancement. That euphoria may be misplaced.】

item.title: 英特尔接近以 16 亿美元收购人工智能芯片初创公司 SambaNova
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英特尔公司正在就收购人工智能芯片初创公司SambaNova Systems Inc.进行深入谈判，包括债务在内的收购价格约为16亿美元。【原文：Intel Corp. is in advanced talks to acquire artificial intelligence chip startup SambaNova Systems Inc. for about $1.6 billion including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 索玛希望通过合并创建价值 120 亿美元的航运技术公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Thoma Bravo 正在洽谈将其航运软件公司 Auctane Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo is in talks to merge its shipping software firm Auctane Inc., formerly known as Stamps.com, with third-party logistics provider WWEX Group to form a business that could be worth as much as $12 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Azul 航空公司重组计划获美国法院批准
item.description: 巴西航空公司Azul SA获得美国法院批准，退出破产程序并实施债权人支持的重组，以削减债务，并获得美国联合航空公司控股公司和美国航空集团公司的新投资。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul SA won US court permission to exit bankruptcy and implement a creditor-backed restructuring that trims debt and lines up new investment from United Airlines Holdings Inc. and American Airlines Group Inc.】

item.title: 阿波罗向财务和法务主管发放 2,350 万美元奖金
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is giving its finance chief and top lawyer retention bonuses totaling $23.5 million.】

item.title: 派拉蒙 540 亿美元债务成为华纳竞购的主角
item.description: 即使派拉蒙天舞公司能够违背华纳兄弟发现公司的意愿接管该公司，它还面临着另一个高难度的障碍：应对它计划承担的 540 亿美元的巨额债务。【原文：Even if Paramount Skydance Corp. manages to take over Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. against the company’s will, it faces another high hurdle: coping with the colossal $54 billion of debt it’s planning to take on.】

item.title: 无尽喧嚣之年，华尔街鞭打追逐潮流者
item.description: 整整一年，华尔街都在为即将发生的大事做准备。【原文：All year, Wall Street has braced for something big to break.】
